name: VCW
description: VCW, the true value coin! 10-year unicorn! connects all things in the world! value driven! (VCW, affiliated with a 10-year-old established unicorn EHZ,is the auxiliary coin of all levels, systems and ecosystems of EHZ.) At the same time, VCW is the value coin, element coin, auxiliary coin, and universal coin that connects all things in the world; driven by value! VCW, a value-driven infrastructure. The use of VCW is extremely broad, and everything that exists in the physical world and the digital world, etc., can be connected and used with VCW. Every entity in the world, from large cities, businesses, and industries, to a single product, an apple, and so on, can use VCW for value-driven progress. VCW is a historic milestone in value connection and value driving all things in the world. The future and direction of the digital coin industry is the true value coin that can create and provide positive energy value. VCW, the true value coin!
